text: Shterev () is a Bulgarian masculine surname, its feminine counterpart is Shtereva. It may refer to *Nikola Shterev (1903–1972), Bulgarian football player and coach *Nikolina Shtereva (born 1955), Bulgarian middle-distance runner *Simeon Shterev (disambiguation) *Vanya Shtereva (born 1970), Bulgarian singer and writer Category:Bulgarian-language surnames
title: Shterev
